short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display zillow home prices in popular cryptocurrencies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this plugin to show the list price of homes on zillow in terms of BTC or Ethereum. This plugin uses the CoinGecko API to fetch the latest price of the selected crypto, and then converts the home's list price to that currency and displays it within the listing details page. 

Planned updates include expanding this to work on the home search grid, as well as converting other dollar values such as estimated mortgage payments. This is a WIP and a project made for having fun, I hope you enjoy!
